== Functions and procedures ==

{{{
procedure nxInitGL;
}}}
Initializes OpenGL, called after initializing rendering context. Is automatically called with nx.CreateGLWindow.
----
== Other ==
{{{
  nxFARZ: single = 1000;
  nxNEARZ: single = 0.1;
  nxFov: single = 45;
  nxAspectRatio: single = 1.33;
}}}
3D-perspective settings should be altered before nxInitGL activates. nxFARZ will change maximum view-distance when using Z-buffer. nxFov determines field-of-view. nxAspectRatio relates to commands nx.Perspective and nx.SetView.

{{{
  nx: TNXGL;
  tex: TGLTextureSet;
}}}
*nx*, and *tex* are automatically instantiated class objects when unit is added to uses-list of your program.
*nx: TNXGL* is basically the core of everything; graphics, rendering settings, fonts, rendering context management, error reporting.
*tex: TGLTextureSet* is class handling all texture-operations; loading of PNG, JPG, BMP formats.
